snippet: The Italian state has freed up more than 30 billion euros to pay debts owed by public-sector bodies to suppliers, but old systems and inefficiency have slowed down repayments, the prime minister's office said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Italy Says Inefficiency Delays Public Sector Debt Repayments
headline.main: Italy Says Inefficiency Delays Public Sector Debt Repayments

lead_paragraph: The Italian state has freed up more than 30 billion euros to pay debts owed by public-sector bodies to suppliers, but old systems and inefficiency have slowed down repayments, the prime minister's office said on Sunday.
